publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4194 Roseanna Cunningham: Red Hackles Against the Mergers—That the Parliament laments the passing of the Black Watch; commiserates with all serving and past soldiers of the regiment and their friends and families; commends the campaign to retain the regiment, and condemns the Westminster Government for its disregard for the history and traditions of the regiment.
S2M-4194 Red Hackles Against the Mergers (lodged on 28 March 2006) Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Brian Monteith*

S2M-4194 Roseanna Cunningham: Red Hackles Against the Mergers—That the Parliament laments the passing of the Black Watch; commiserates with all serving and past soldiers of the regiment and their friends and families; commends the campaign to retain the regiment, and condemns the Westminster Government for its disregard for the history and traditions of the regiment. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Mr Brian Monteith
S2M-4194 Red Hackles Against the Mergers (lodged on 28 March 2006) Donald Gorrie*
